availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Nancy J. Newman. Father of Josiah E. Newman, Mary E. Newman, Sarah Newman, and Eliza Newman. Farmer in Hancock County in 1850.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Unnamed District, p. 274 B; Find A Grave, "Thomas M. Newman (1819 - 1894)," Memorial #90278374, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=90278374 (accessed September 12, 2017).
